rg2 1.0
  • Reference

Sankey chart

g2Sankey.Rd

Sankey chart

g2Sankey(
  data,
  sourceField,
  targetField,
  weightField,
  nodeWidthRatio = 8e-04,
  nodeWidthPadding = 0.001,
  nodeAlign = "the justify",
  color = NULL,
  cfg = list(),
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL
)

Arguments

data

a data object.Currently supported object is data.frame, data should only contains the necessary data for chart (reduce json/data transmission)
sourceField, targetField, weightField

column name in data for aesthetic mapping.
nodeWidthRatio

Sankey diagram node width configuration, 0 ~ 1, refer to the width of the canvas, the default is' 0.008 '.
nodeWidthPadding

The vertical spacing between nodes in Sankey diagram, 0 ~ 1, referring to the height of the canvas, default is' 0.01 '.
nodeAlign

The sankey diagram node layout direction, the default is the justify, can choose the 'left' | 'right' | 'center' | 'the justify' four ways.
color

color
cfg

configuration of G2Plot. See https://g2plot.antv.vision/en/docs/api/plot-api for more details.
width

width of the chart
height

height of the chart

See also

Other g2: g2MultiView()
